content.webTitle: Escape's picks of the week: The quirky weekend

fields.headline: The quirky weekend
fields.bodyText: Fancy yourself as a Mills & Boon novelist? You could learn to describe the ultimate tall dark stranger on a romantic writing course at the Castle of Park (01466 751111) hotel in Scotland, from 13-19 May. The course is taught by Sharon Kendrick, one of Mills & Boon's most prolific authors, and costs from £650pp including transfers to and from Aberdeen, accommodation and meals including wine.
